items.title: Learn C shell Scripting
items.headline: C shell scripting
objectives_summary: A student will have a fair idea of Variables. Using operators such as AND and OR which are invaluable in any scripting or programming language. The course is extremely helpful for System Administrators to customize their users' environment. For applications users, meaning those that use Linux based applications, will have more in-depth knowledge of their Operating Systems. The course will equip you to understand and use Linux in a different manner. For those striving to go deeper in the C shell environment, my book “Learning C shell scripting Gently” is attached in the last section of the course. The book has many more scripts and detailed information to make best use of the C Shell environment and scripting.
